articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Message to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Message to Russian President
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a congratulatory message to President of the Russian Federation D. Medvedev on his birthday on Tuesday. 
					 The message said:
					
					 Place accept my congratulations to you on your birthday. 
					
					 I wish you good health and success in the work for stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed in a compatriotic atmosphere with the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 62nd birthday of the DPRK led by Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Mexican FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Mexican FM
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Patricia Espinosa Cantellano, foreign minister of Mexico, on Sept. 4 on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Mexico. 
					 Noting that the two countries have favorably developed the bilateral relations while respecting and cooperating with each other in the idea of independence, peace and friendship for over the past three decades, the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger on the principles of respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefit in the future, too.

articles.title: Solatium from Cambodian Great King
articles.content:
Solatium from Cambodian Great King
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Cambodian Great King Norodom Sihanouk offered solatium in connection with the recent floods which hit some regions of the DPRK including Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province, causing huge material losses.
					 The solatium was conveyed to DPRK Ambassador to Cambodia Ri In Sok by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace of Cambodia, authorized by the great king on Sep. 11.
					
					 Expressing heartfelt condolences to the DPRK government and its fraternal people on behalf of the king, great king and great queen, he conveyed the hope of the great king that the solatium would make a contribution to the Korean people's efforts for doing away with the losses as soon as possible and hastening the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of DPRK and Laos
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of DPRK and Laos
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Talks between delegations of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security and the Lao Ministry of Public Security were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation headed by Minister of People's Security Ju Sang Song and from the Lao side were members of the delegation led by Minister of Public Security Thongbanh Seng A Phone, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, and Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the matter of developing cooperation between the two countries in the field of security and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift from Laos Figure
articles.content:
Gift from Laos Figure
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting Minister of Public Security of Laos Thongbanh Seng A Phone, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by the minister of Public Security of Laos on Tuesday.

articles.title: Gifts from Chinese Groups
articles.content:
Gifts from Chinese Groups
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Local Association of International Friendly Contact of China which participated in the Second Forum of the DPRK-China University Presidents.
					 Meanwhile, he received a gift from the Shanghai Association for International Friendly Contact.
					
					 The gifts were conveyed to an official concerned by Li Qingzhou, chairman of the Xiamen Association for International Friendly Contact, and Zhang Yan, assistant to the chairman of the Shanghai Association for International Friendly Contact.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Democratic Women's Union Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Democratic Women's Union Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea headed by Chairwoman of its Central Committee Ro Song Sil left here on Tuesday to attend the celebrations of the 15th anniversary of the 4th World Women's Conference to be held in Shanghai.  
					 Arriving here on the same day was a delegation of the Lao Ministry of Public Security led by Minister Thongbanh Seng A Phone, secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party. 
					
					 The DPRK Ministry of People's Security arranged a reception for the delegation at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Participants in 2nd Forum of DPRK-China University Presidents Feted
articles.content:
Participants in 2nd Forum of DPRK-China University Presidents Feted
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association and the Education Commission of the DPRK arranged a reception for the participants in the Second Forum of the DPRK-China University Presidents at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday.  
					 Present there on invitation were a delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Education, a delegation of universities of China, a delegation of musical academies of China and a delegation of the Local Association of International Friendly Contact of China and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the commission, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the association, Jon Kuk Man, vice-chairman of the commission, officials of various universities and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid
articles.content:
Tribute to Kim Il Sung Paid
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Second Forum of the DPRK-China University Presidents Tuesday visited the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid a basket of flowers before the statue and made bows in humble reverence to the President who made immortal contributions to boosting the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Phyongchon College of Technology
articles.content:
Phyongchon College of Technology
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, large factories and enterprises and major industrial zones have their own study-while-working networks. 
					 Phyongchon College of Technology, situated in Pyongyang, is one of them.
					
					 The college was founded in September Juche 59 (1970) after President Kim Il Sung established a new education system for workers.
					
					 Over the last four decades, it has trained thousands of technicians of electronic automation and mechanical engineering.
					
					Some of them are winners of the title of Labor Hero and factory managers and chief engineers.
					
					 Taking the Pyongyang Automation Instrument Factory as an example, 55 percent of the workshop heads and above and 65 percent of the technicians are graduates of the college. 
					
					 The college has also developed a device for measuring the magnetic flux density, a great output supersonic wave generator and many other things needed to update industrial establishments.
					
					 Its teachers have steadily improved the contents and methods of education to give the students practical knowledge so that they can contribute to production and technological advance.
					
					 They have also published a lot of textbooks, references and scientific and technological books. 
					
					 The study-while-working higher education system, which has been consolidated under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, is fully displaying its advantages in the effort of building a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Pyongyang Optical Center
articles.content:
Pyongyang Optical Center
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Optical Center, situated in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, has recently developed a new technology of testing eyesight and adjusting glasses.
					 This technology enjoys popularity at home and abroad for its correct test and precise adjustment.
					
					 The center runs a glasses shop.
					
					 It, which has several thousand kinds of rims and lens, has conducted technical exchange with southeastern Asian countries in visual power measurement, lens processing, etc.
					
					 Kim Sang Ju, manager of the center, told KCNA that it had provided services to more than 228,000 people at the age ranging from 5 to 95 since it was opened in June Juche 75 (1986).
					
					 Among the customers are embassy officials in Pyongyang and other foreigners visiting the DPRK.

articles.title: Jilin City Associated with Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Jilin City Associated with Revolutionary Activities of Kim Il Sung
						
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Jilin City, China, is one of the places connected with the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung.
					During his early revolutionary activities he stayed in the city to train young Korean people as core revolutionaries.
					
					After forming Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) in Huadian in October Juche 15 (1926), he moved to the city in January 1927 to carry on revolutionary activities in an extensive way, while studying at Jilin Yuwen Middle School.
					
					He studied progressive ideas through revolutionary books and disseminated them among youth and students.
					
					He legally formed the Korean Children's Association in Jilin and reorganized the Ryogil Association of Korean Students in Jilin, a friendly society of students sponsored by nationalists, as the Ryugil Association of Korean Students to bring up Korean students in a revolutionary way.
					
					He also reorganized the DIU as the Anti-imperialist Youth League in August 1927 with its branches in various areas and then formed the Young Communist League of Korea.
					
					A large number of young Korean people, rallied around him on the basis of revolutionary fidelity and comradeship, became revolutionaries responsible for the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					The President successfully led the struggle against the Jilin-Hoeryong railway project of the Japanese imperialists and campaign to boycott Japanese goods in some 40 days from the latter part of October 1928.
					
					Arrested by police in autumn of 1929, he continued the struggle in Jilin prison until early May 1930, maturing a far-reaching plan of the Korean revolution.
					
					When visiting Jilin City in last August, General Secretary Kim Jong Il expressed deep thanks to the Chinese party, government and people for well preserving historical relics related with the President's revolutionary activities.

articles.title: International Obligation Noted in History of DPRK-China Friendship
articles.content:
International Obligation Noted in History of DPRK-China Friendship
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Upon the lapse of sixty-five years since President Kim Il Sung published a famous work, "Let Us Actively Support the Chinese People in Their Revolutionary Struggle," the Korean army and people are recollecting the brilliant feats performed by him for the development of the DPRK-China friendship.
					 By publishing the work on September 15, Juche 34 (1945), he made an imperishable contribution to the victory of the Chinese revolution, consolidating the foundations of the DPRK-China friendship and developing the bilateral ties.
					
					During General Secretary Kim Jong Il's latest China visit, Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), told him that everywhere in Northeast China bore the footprints of revolutionary activities conducted by President Kim Il Sung and that he had not only won back the independence of Korea but made a great contribution to victory in the Chinese revolution. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung rendered unsparing assistance to the Chinese revolution for its victory not only during the 20-year-long anti-Japanese revolution but after the liberation of Korea. His strong sense of international obligation, true and comradely, turned the friendship between the two countries into a special and unbreakable one. 
					
					 When the Chiang Kai-shek clique was trying hard to put the northeast area under its control in league with the U.S. imperialists behind the scene of peace talks with the CPC just after the Japanese imperialists' defeat in August 1945, Kim Il Sung made a decision to help the Chinese people in their revolutionary struggle. 
					
					 He, who had called for strengthening revolutionary unity between the Korean and Chinese peoples on several occasions, made public the historic talk "Let Us Actively Support the Chinese People in Their Revolutionary Struggle," to manifest his revolutionary position of supporting the Chinese revolution at the cost of blood.
					
					 In the talk he noted that the Chinese revolution was part of the Asian people's national liberation struggle and that defending the northeast area was of weighty importance in promoting the victory of the Chinese revolution. He also said if the CPC occupied the area, it would play a great role in the Chinese revolution.
					
					 He put forward it as a primary task to actively help with organization of armed units and called for cooperating with the Chinese people in the establishment of a democratic government and the formation of party and mass organizations and a united front in the northeast area and directing great effort to cementing the unity between the Korean and Chinese peoples.
					
					 His idea and intention concerning the unity between the Korean and Chinese revolutionaries and peoples which he had mentioned on many occasions including some historical meetings during the hard-fought anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle were implemented on a new, higher level after the publication of the work.
					
					 According to his decisive step to fully aid the Chinese people in their revolutionary struggle, lots of fine military and political cadres and members of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) were dispatched to Northeast China.
					
					 The area was a point of strategic importance in the Chinese revolution. Addressing the 7th Conference of the CPC, Chairman Mao Zedong said if the northeast area were seized even though all of the existing bases were lost, the Chinese revolution would have its foundations.
					
					Officers of the KPRA armed tens of thousands of young Korean people and enrolled more than 120,000 people in a paramilitary organization, forming many armed units of Koreans throughout the area.
					
					 They also formed party and mass organizations and united front organizations, launched democratic reforms including agrarian reform. At the same time, they cleaned up the counterrevolutionary forces -- remnants of the defeated Japanese army and puppet Manchukuo, wealthy landowners, rebels and lackeys -- to provide favorable conditions for the liberation of the northeast area.
					
					Though Korea was in hard time right after the liberation, Kim Il Sung allowed the CPC to move or transport large quantities of materials and lots of personnel via Nampho, Rajin and other places of Korea and sent it some 100,000 guns, munitions, explosives, medicines, cloth for military uniforms, shoes and many other military supplies.
					
					Zhou Bao-zhong, a leading officer of the Northeast Democratic Allied Army, said the aid materials sent by Korea in two and a half years from summer of 1946 to 1948 were as much as over 2,000 railway vehicles and that the Chinese people should not forget the selfless internationalist assistance of the Korean people led by Kim Il Sung for the Chinese liberation struggle. 
					
					 Whenever the northeast liberation war faced harsh ordeals, Kim Il Sung gave the Chinese friends strategic and tactical advices and opinions to make a tangible contribution to victory in the Chinese revolution.
					
					 A Chinese book says that his advices based on foresightedness and scientific penetration greatly helped with military operations of the Chinese army and that from this point of view the victory in major operations in the northeast liberation war was closely linked with his name.
					
					 Loyal to his leadership hundreds of thousands of young Korean people distinguished themselves, displaying matchless heroism and self-sacrificing spirit, in battlefields in the northeast area including Siping, Jilin, Shengyang and Changchun.
					
					 At that time the commander of the Northeast People's Liberation Army sent a gift to Kim Il Sung, highly appreciating his advises and unsparing assistance for the victory in the Siping liberation battle. Other commanding officers of China said the gift was a token of their feeling that they would like to repay his favor by making shoes with their hair.
					
					 As Kim Il Sung expected, the Korean revolutionaries' joining in the war radically changed the balance of forces between the revolutionary forces and the counterrevolutionary forces, helped liberate the northeast area to turn the situation favorable to victory in the Chinese revolution.
					
					 Korean units also rendered heroic services in the liberation war in mainland China, bringing the flowers of friendship between the two countries into bloom in many areas including Beijing, Tianjin, Changjiang and even the southern tip of China. 
					
					 Chinese leaders said the five-star red flag was permeated with blood shed by Koreans, while the Chiang Kai-shek clique said they were defeated due to Kim Il Sung's strategies and tactics and the dispatch of troops by Korea.
					
					 Chinese revolutionaries and people made sincere effort for the development of the friendship between Korea and China, praising Kim Il Sung as a great internationalist and the closest friend of the Chinese people who assisted the Chinese revolution with all sincerity for many years.  
					
					 The armies and peoples of the two countries, carrying forward the tradition of the joint fighting in the anti-Japanese war in Northeast China and the Chinese liberation war, joined hands in the Korean war, too, to inflict a disastrous defeat upon the United States, the first of its kind in the U.S. history, and creditably defended the precious gains of the revolution in the two countries and peace of Asia and the rest of the world. 
					
					 The traditional friendship provided by Kim Il Sung together with the Chinese leaders of the elder generation has ever developed through generations and centuries.
					
					 The two rounds of unofficial China visit by Kim Jong Il this year marking the 65th anniversary of the publication of the afore-said work and the 60th anniversary of the entry into the Korean front of the Chinese People's Volunteers fully demonstrated that the DPRK-China friendship will never be affected by the passage of time and alternation of generations. 
					
					 Through the recent unofficial visit of Kim Jong Il the revolutionary history and feats of Kim Il Sung recorded in Northeast China became dearer to the Korean and Chinese people and the unshakable will of the Workers' Party and government of Korea to steadily develop the bilateral friendship and cooperation was fully demonstrated. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung's life shining with great internationalist obligation will be remembered in all ages along with the everlasting friendship between the DPRK and China and their common cause will surely be accomplished under deep care and close cooperation of the two parties, two countries and the two peoples.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges Japan's Settlement of Crime-woven Past
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges Japan's Settlement of Crime-woven Past 
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Japan's settlement of its past has become a serious international requirement.
					 Voices demanding Japan's redemption of its past crimes against humanity have grown stronger on several international arenas with the 65th anniversary of the Japanese imperialists' defeat as a momentum.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that Amnesty International recently made public a statement demanding the Japanese government make reparation to victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 This was an indictment against the arch criminal who pushed the world into turmoil and, at the same time, a revelation of the strong desire and wish of the international community never to allow the bitter past history to repeat itself.
					
					 It is well known that the Japanese imperialists' invasion of Korea and 40-odd year long colonial military fascist rule over it were the most barbarous state-sponsored crimes unprecedented in the world history.
					
					 During their colonial rule the Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted more than 8.4 million young and middle-aged Koreans and forced them to do medieval slave labor or used them as cannon fodder at wars. They even massacred more than one million Koreans in cold blood.
					
					 The crime of sexual slavery was the most hideous crime against humanity among all the crimes the Japanese imperialists committed against the Korean people.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists reduced not only girls in their teens but even married women, 200 000 in all, to sexual playthings of the Japanese imperialist aggressors, violating their youth and chastity at battlefields. They went the lengths of making no scruple of killing them in a brutal manner in order to cover up their monstrous crimes.
					
					 The Japanese government, however, has tried hard to shirk off the responsibility for those hideous crimes beyond human imagination in a bid to hoodwink the international community.
					
					 Japan has persistently turned a deaf ear to the strong demand of the victims who have suffered from moral and physical pain for scores of years after the war due to the Japanese imperialists and the just voices of the international community calling for the probe into the truth against the past crimes and state apology and reparation.
					
					 The Japanese ultra-right conservatives unhesitatingly let loose such brigandish sophism that the Japanese imperialists' military occupation and colonial fascist rule over Korea were "legitimate" and they did "many good things in Korea". Not content with this, they deleted contents dealing with such past crimes as forcible drafting of Koreans and sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army from history books.
					
					 Japan has persistently denied its past.
					
					 The present chief executive of Japan in a statement recently issued on the occasion of the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" did not mention at all the issue of handling and making reparation for above-mentioned hideous crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people.
					
					 What merits serious attention is that the Japanese ultra-right conservatives busied themselves calling for publishing a statement in protest against the statement of the prime minister and the right-wing media joined them, crying that they can never allow the personal opinion of the prime minister.
					
					 This was nothing but hysteric outburst of the Japanese reactionaries getting hell-bent to totally deny the crime-woven history and evade the settlement of the past.
					
					 Voices demanding Japan's redemption of its past has grown stronger among Asian countries and on several international arenas in recent years. This represents their non-confidence in Japan and indictment against it as it has desperately tried to distort and conceal its past crimes and flee from the responsibility for them at any cost.
					
					 No statute of limitations is applicable to the crimes against humanity.
					
					 The further Japan delays the settlement of its past, the much more debt it will have to face.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Projected Saber-Rattling Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Projected Saber-Rattling Blasted 
						
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The United States plans to stage combined anti-submarine exercises in the West Sea of Korea together with the south Korean puppet forces after bringing nuclear-powered submarines to Japan. This is a premeditated saber-rattling to escalate the military confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula and push the situation to a catastrophic phase of a nuclear war. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed commentary. 
					 The U.S. imperialists have frequently hurled aircraft carriers and nuclear-powered submarines into waters off south Korea and its vicinity. This was to meet their sinister intention to kick off the Tomahawk cruise missile strike operation against the DPRK from the sea, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is an invariable ambition of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to deploy huge armed forces for aggression in south Korea and its vicinity beforehand and then make a surprise armed invasion of the DPRK with the military exercises as an opportunity.
					
					 It is the U.S. imperialists' calculation to kick off extremely provocative war exercises in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity and thus render the situation tense, disturb the peace and stability of the region and contain big powers who are their potential "rivals".
					
					 The U.S. frantic arms buildup for aggression and war exercises in and around south Korea would seriously disturb peace and stability in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and escalate the military confrontation and the danger of a war.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand and revolutionary principle of the DPRK to respond to good faith in kind and counter force with force.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to clearly face up to the DPRK's principled stand and stop at once the nuclear war racket.

articles.title: Projected Farce for Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Projected Farce for Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The "Inchon landing operation", conducted by the U.S. imperialists during the last Korean War, will be reportedly replayed on a large scale in the waters off Wolmi Island on Sept. 15 under the signboard of "commemoration event". Involved in this event in form of military drill will be warships, airplanes, landing armored-vehicles, high-speed landing crafts and marines of the U.S. and the south Korean armed forces.
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Tuesday carries a signed commentary.
					
					 The event, the south Korean authorities are defending as "commemorative" and the like, is, in fact, a provocation to the DPRK and a revelation of their ambition for invasion of it that remains unchanged though over half a century has passed, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The "Inchon landing operation" was a crime committed with aims to bring down the Korean people, who rose up in the just war of liberation against the aggression by outside forces and traitors, and realize their wild design for domination over the whole of Korea at any cost.
					
					 What the south Korean authorities intend in replaying the "operation" is to paint the U.S. as "savior" and "benefactor" and thus justify their treacherous policy of sycophancy toward the U.S., quell the people's growing anti-U.S. sentiment and further strengthen the "alliance" for war of aggression with their master. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that the said event is not intended merely for praising the U.S. and distorting the history of aggression, a history of injustice.
					
					 To eulogize the U.S. imperialists' history of war of aggression on the DPRK just means the will to repeat it. The present developments show that the south Korean conservative authorities are seeking to go for confrontation with compatriots in league with outside forces and realize their scheme for invasion of the DPRK at any cost, consistently turning aside the improvement of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should renounce such farce for confrontation with the DPRK at once, pondering over the serious consequences to be entailed by it.

articles.title: Japan's Vicious Scheme to Distort History Slashed
articles.content:
Japan's Vicious Scheme to Distort History Slashed
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Japan Times, an English-language newspaper, carried a string of absurd sophism justifying the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty." It said that the then Emperor of Korea transferred all the state sovereignty to the Japanese king once and for all according to the "treaty" and the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea contributed to modernizing it. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This has stoked the feelings of bitterness toward Japan among the Korean people as it was part of the Japanese reactionaries' vicious distortion of history aimed to persistently whitewash Japan's crime-woven past. 
					
					 It is universally recognized that the "treaty" fabricated by the Japanese imperialists was completely illegal.
					
					 The Japanese imperialist aggressors' armed invasion and their harsh colonial rule over Korea brought tremendous mental and material damage and losses to its people and caused them untold misfortune and hardships.   
					
					 This notwithstanding, the conservative media of Japan made such reckless remark that the Japanese imperialists' past colonial rule over Korea contributed to its modernization. This is an intolerable insult to the Korean people. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have persistently schemed to distort the crime-woven history. Lurking behind this is their sinister wild ambition to incite militarism in the Japanese society by distorting and whitewashing the Japanese imperialists' history of aggression at any cost and thus create atmosphere favorable for overseas expansion and realize their ambition for reinvasion. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that their undisguised move to tamper with history is not an issue to be dealt with some media or individual politicians only. 
					
					 The clumsy farce of issuing a statement of "apology" staged by Japanese Prime Minister Naoto Kan on Aug. 10 vividly showed the stand and attitude of the Japanese government toward the past crime-woven history as it was nothing but a cynical ploy to evade the responsibility for the crime of aggression. 
					
					 Japan should immediately stop distorting the history and take honest approach to the issue of its redemption, clearly facing up to the trend of the international community advancing toward the reconciliation and cooperation after breaking with the inglorious past.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Invincible Might
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Invincible Might
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Today the Workers' Party of Korea is demonstrating its invincible might, enjoying high leadership authority. A fundamental key to it is that it has struck its roots deep among the popular masses and formed a harmonious whole with them.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 One who believes and depends on the people is sure to always emerge victorious but one who is forsaken by the people is bound to meet ruins only. This is a maxim of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK is a great guide helping the people go along the way of worthwhile life enjoying the noblest political life, a reliable guardian protecting and taking care of the independent dignity and destiny of the people and a creator of happiness rendering devotedly service to provide the people with rich and highly civilized life.
					
					 The Party values the political integrity of the people and takes upon itself full responsibility for their socio-political integrity just as mothers' hearts go out to their children. Such loving care and trust instilled into the hearts of the people the firm faith to always share their destiny with the Party and linked the Party and the masses with one blood vessel.
					
					 Our Party's embrace is broad as it believes and puts forward anyone as permanent companion without discrimination if he or she is willing to serve the Party and the revolution. It is also an embrace of a brilliant life as it takes care of those whom it has once shown loving care for and reposed trust in with responsibility.
					
					 Reflected in our Party's Songun politics is an unshakable will to make our people the most dignified and powerful people no one can dare look down upon.
					
					 Our Party, regarding it as the supreme principle of its activities to steadily improve the standard of people's living, has orientated everything to improving the standard of people's living, not making any calculations despite difficulties and shortages.
					
					 The Party believes in the people as in Heaven and renders devoted services to them while the people firmly believes and follows the Party as the embrace of mother, thereby forming a great harmonious whole. Herein lies an invincible might and immensely bright future of the country.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, programme for its implementation, supported by all the Koreans constitute the foundation for improving the inter-Korean relations and they serve as the only guidelines to be adhered to by the north and the south in achieving the reconciliation, unity and cooperation and developing the relations as they are reunification programmes common to the nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The publication of the north-south joint declarations helped the north and the south to turn the relations of distrust and confrontation into those of "By our nation itself" for the promotion of the reconciliation and unity and advance toward the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The issue of the inter-Korean relations can be successfully solved only when the Koreans give overriding importance to the dignity and interests of the nation and orientate everything to this end in the spirit of "By our nation itself."
					
					 There is no doubt that the reconciliation and unity of the nation will be realized and the movement of national reunification make victorious advance along the orbit of the independence when the north and the south thoroughly embody the idea of "By our nation itself" on the basis of the said declarations.
					
					 As clearly expounded in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the inter-Korean relations should be reunification-oriented for the promotion of the national reconciliation and unity and the main principle of achieving common interests and co-prosperity based on mutual accommodation and mutual support and assistance should be observed in the inter-Korean cooperation for the coordinated development of the nation and the prosperity common to the nation.
					
					 The improved inter-Korean relations are a crucial problem related to the destiny of the nation and no one has the right to make it a bargaining chip.

articles.title: Immensely Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Called for
articles.content:
Immensely Glorifying Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Called for
						
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- A main key to winning a victory in the great surge lies in the militant work-style of the people working hard regarding a single day as hundred and thousand days, while keeping pace with General Secretary Kim Jong Il's forced march of devoted patriotism, Rodong Sinmun editorially stresses this Tuesday.
					 Calling upon all the people to immensely glorify the feats he performed in the party-building and effect a great revolutionary surge in building a thriving nation, united around the headquarters of the revolution in single mind, the editorial goes on:
					
					 He turned the Workers' Party of Korea into an invincible party struggling with President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as guidelines and developed it into the ranks of vanguard fighters who have achieved the steel-strong cohesion and unity moving as one centered on the headquarters of the revolution. These are feats he accomplished in the party-building.
					
					 Another feat he performed is that he thoroughly established the President's work method and leadership mode in the whole party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il directed primary efforts into turning our party into an ideologically pure entity based on the President's revolutionary idea in the whole course of leading the party work.
					
					 He developed the party guided by the Juche idea and the Songun idea. His leadership has served as a main source which helped the party emerge ever-victorious while setting an epoch-making example in building a socialist ruling party amid the vortex of complicated history.
					
					 All the party members advance along the path of Juche indicated by the President, the path indicated by the Juche idea and the Songun idea, no matter which way the wind may blow. This is a true appearance of our party. 
					
					 The party's cohesion and unity reached the highest level and its militant might has remarkably grown stronger under Kim Jong Il's leadership. 
					
					 The organizational integrity that has achieved oneness in the movement, united around the Central Committee of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il as firm as an iron wall precisely represents the ever-victorious WPK. 
					
					 The party fully demonstrating its militant might on all fronts of building a thriving nation, while winning popularity with its roots deeply struck among the popular masses convinces our army and people of the greatness of Kim Jong Il steering the cause of the party-building as the President did.

articles.title: Actions for Probing Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Probing Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Living, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public an appeal on Sept. 9, declaring that it would turn out in the struggle to probe the truth behind the warship sinking case.
					 The appeal said that if the people harbor any slightest expectation on the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government" south Korea would be embroiled in a war anytime, and stressed the need to launch the vigorous anti-war struggle for peace of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is urgent to direct efforts on probing the truth about the "Cheonan" case full of doubts, before anything else, and deal a decisive strike at the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak "government", it said.
					
					 The appeal called for vigorous mass actions to probe the truth about the case.
					
					 Underlining the need to steadily wage the struggle demanding repeal of the DPRK-targeted joint military exercises with the U.S., it declared that the solidarity would set the period for an intensive movement for peace of the Korean Peninsula from Sept. 8 to Oct. 4 and conduct a vigorous action.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Egyptian President Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Egyptian President Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- As special envoy of Egyptian President Muhammad Hosni Mubarak, the secretary of the Chamberlain of the Presidency, visited the DPRK embassy in Cairo on Sept. 8 to celebrate the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 On the occasion the special envoy expressed belief that the historical relations of friendship between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued to Commemorate Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued to Commemorate Birthday of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Peru and Bangladesh issued bulletins to mark the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The Peruvian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung issued its bulletin on September 3, which carried a portrait of the smiling President and an article titled "The 62nd birthday of the DPRK".
					
					 The bulletin noted in an article that Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK and developed it into an independent socialist country.
					
					 Recalling that the DPRK introduced the universal free medical care system and the free compulsory education system and abolished the tax system and has stood in the van of the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. struggle, it said that the DPRK advancing toward a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il is winning the worldwide admiration for its powerful war deterrent built under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Over the past years the DPRK has strengthened friendship and solidarity with the world progressives while making everything serve the people and pushing ahead with the economic construction and the development of science and technology on the principle of independence, it noted.
					
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee stressed in its bulletin on Sept. 6 that over the past 62 years since the birth of a genuine independent and sovereign state proclaimed by Kim Il Sung, the DPRK has turned into a unique people-centered socialist state.
					
					 The DPRK has greeted a new golden age in which the dignity and strength of the country has been put on the highest phase, it said.
					
					 The committee extends full support and encouragement to the Korean people in the cause of national reunification, expressing belief that they will surely emerge victorious in the drive to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the bulletin stressed.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, September 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings, opening ceremonies of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions, film shows and other events were held in Sweden, Mongolia, Russia, Nigeria and Malaysia between August 27 and September 6 to celebrate the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 On display in their venues were works of the peerlessly great men and photos on their exploits, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "The Country Shining with Arms of Mt. Paektu" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said that the DPRK turned into an invincible socialist power under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Today the Korean people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il are reliably defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, the socialist system and peace and dynamically advancing to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche noted that the DPRK has developed at a high rate despite the U.S. and its followers' moves to stifle the DPRK. But for the aggression moves and pressure of the U.S. and its followers, the DPRK would have developed at a more rapid tempo, he added.
					
					 The deputy mayor of a city of Russia said: In the past Russia and the DPRK had closely cooperated in all fields. Their relations have made a radical advance in the new century. We extend warm congratulations to the Korean people on the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at a meeting in Sweden.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il felicita a Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il felicita a Medvedev
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 14 un mensaje al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, para felicitarle por su  cumpleanos.
					La misiva senala:
					
					Hago llegarle a usted mis calidas felicitaciones por su cumpleanos.
					
					Le deseo buena salud y exitos en su trabajo por la estabilidad y el desarrollo del pais.

articles.title: ATCC exige la liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon
articles.content:
ATCC exige la liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon es hoy un problema internacional muy serio.
					  Ultimamente, con motivo del 65o aniversario de la derrota de Japon en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, suben de tono en varios escenarios internacionales las voces que demandan la liquidacion total de los crimenes antieticos cometidos en el siglo pasado por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					  Al unirse a tal corriente, la Amnistia Internacional hizo publica hace poco una declaracion demandando al gobierno japones que indemnice a las ex consoladoras sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones.
					
					  Esta nota significa la condena al que hizo caer el mundo en la conflagracion, y refleja la fuerte demanda de la sociedad internacional de que no se repitan mas nunca los crimenes ensangrentados del pasado.
					
					  Como esta conocido por todos, la agresion a Corea por los imperialistas japoneses y su dominacion colonial militar y fascista sobre ella, que duro mas de 40 anos, son crimenes estatales mas barbaros sin precedentes en la historia.
					
					  Durante su dominacion colonial, los imperialistas japoneses arrestaron forzosamente a mas de 8 millones 400 mil jovenes y adultos coreanos para obligarles el trabajo esclavista de la Edad Media y lanzarlos como carne de canon a las guerras de agresion y asesinaron cruelmente a mas de un millon de coreanos. 
					
					  Lo peor de los crimenes de lesa humanidad de Japon fue el de consoladoras sexuales para las tropas japonesas.
					
					  Los imperialistas japoneses convirtieron a 200 mil coreanas, desde las ninas de unos diez anos hasta las casadas, en esclavas sexuales para los agresores y violaron su juventud y virginidad llevandolas consigo a los campos de guerra.
					
					  Y para encubrir este crimen, cometieron la fechoria de asesinarlas salvajemente.
					
					  Pero, el gobierno japones esta enganando al mundo eludiendo la responsabilidad por esos inimaginables e irrefutables crimenes de lesa humanidad.
					
					  No quiere escuchar el clamor de las victimas, que sufren todavia, a mas de varios decenios desde el fin de la guerra, las secuelas espirituales y fisicas de los crimenes de Japon, y la voz justa de la sociedad internacional en demanda del esclarecimiento de estos delitos, la disculpa e indemnizacion de nivel estatal.
					
					  Anteriormente, las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas de Japon pronunciaron sin escrupulos unos disparates tan cinicos como que la ocupacion militar y la dominacion fascista colonial de los imperialistas japoneses sobre Corea fueron "legitimas" y "estos hicieron muchos favores" en Corea.
					
					En el mismo contexto, eliminaron de los libros de historia los hechos criminales del pasado como el arresto forzoso de coreanos y el citado sistema de esclavitud sexual.
					
					  Japon sigue negando hasta la fecha sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					  En su reciente declaracion publicada en ocasion del centenario de la falsificacion del "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon", el actual mandatario japones no hizo referencia alguna al tratamiento ni a la indemnizacion de los referidos crimenes.
					
					  Sin embargo, las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas de Japon armaron escandalos publicando la nota de protesta por esa declaracion superficial del premier y los medios de prensa derechistas se unieron a ellas sosteniendo que no pueden permitir jamas tal criterio privado del premier.
					
					  Esto parte del fanatismo de los reaccionarios japoneses por rehusar totalmente su historia criminal y eludir obstinadamente la liquidacion de ella.
					
					  En los ultimos anos, en los paises asiaticos y varias escenas internacionales se elevan mas las voces que demandan la liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon. Esto deviene la expresion de desconfianza y condena a Japon.
					
					  Los crimenes de lesa humanidad no tienen prescripcion.
					
					  Mientras Japon dilate la liquidacion de sus crimenes del pasado, seran cada vez mas grandes sus deudas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras belicas de EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras belicas de EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos introduce sus submarinos nucleares en Japon e intenta realizar forzosamente en el Mar Oeste de Corea el entrenamiento anti-submarinos junto con los belicistas surcoreanos, lo cual es el alboroto de guerra intencional para agravar el enfrentamiento militar y la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y llevar la situacion a la catastrofica guerra nuclear.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis introducen frecuentemente portaaviones y submarinos nucleares en el mar del Sur de Corea y en su contorno para la operacion de ataque del misil crucero "Tomahwak" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea desde el mar.
					
					Es invariable la ambicion de ellos de aplastarla con la fuerza.
					
					Tambien intentan realizar la inesperada agresion militar contra la RPDC en el curso de los ejercicios militares en el Sur de Corea y contorno con numerosos efectivos agresivos introducidos de antemano.
					
					Con tales provocativos ejercicios de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y en sus alrededores, tienden a  agravar la situacion, destruir la paz y la estabilidad de esta region y sostener a rayas las potencias a que consideran como sus "adversarios".
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. aumente a las fuerzas armadas agresoras en el Sur de Corea y su contorno y emprenda el camino de ejercicios de guerra, tanto mas serian destruidas severamente la paz y la estabilidad del Noreste Asiatico y el  resto del mundo y se agrandaria el peligro del enfrentamiento militar y de la guerra.
					
					Responder con la buena fe a la buena fe y con la fuerza a la fuerza es la inmutable posicion y el principio revolucionario de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de tal posicion de principios de nuestro pais y parar ahora mismo la campana de guerra nuclear.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza versiones de "Japan Times"
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza versiones de "Japan Times"
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, al dar tinte positivo al inventado "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon", el periodico japones en idioma ingles "Japan Times" divulgo unos embustes como que en virtud de ese tratado, el entonces emperador coreano "transfirio para siempre y por completo" al rey japones la soberania de Corea y que la dominacion colonial de Japon sobre Corea habia "contribuido a la modernizacion de esta".
					Estas versiones redoblan la enemistad del pueblo coreano hacia Japon porque forman parte de la obstinada campana de tergiversacion de la historia de los reaccionarios japoneses para embellecer su pasado lleno de crimenes.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 14 y continua:
					
					Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que es completamente ilegal ese "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon" inventado por el imperialismo japones.
					
					Debido a la invasion armada y la brutal dominacion colonial de los agresores japoneses, el pueblo coreano ha sufrido grandes perdidas espirituales y materiales e indecibles desgracias y sufrimientos.
					
					Sin embargo, los medios de prensa conservadores de Japon disparatean que el coloniaje japones "contribuyo a la modernizacion de Corea", lo cual constituye un insulto insoportable para el pueblo coreano.
					
					La ambicion terrible, que persiguen los reaccionarios japoneses con la tergiversacion de su historia de crimenes, es realizar la reagresion al inculcar el militarismo en la sociedad japonesa y preparar el ambiente favorable a la expansion a ultramar.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que tales maniobras no son de unos medios de prensa o figuras politicas.
					
					Es que el 10 de agosto pasado, el premier japones Naoto Kan orquesto la sucia farsa de "pedir disculpas" publicando una declaracion.
					
					Esta artimana para eludir la responsabilidad sobre los crimenes de agresion demuestra claramente la posicion del gobierno japones sobre la historia de sus crimenes del pasado.
					
					Japon debe cesar ahora mismo su campana de tergiversacion de la historia y proceder con actitud sincera a la liquidacion del pasado criminal viendo correctamente la corriente de la sociedad internacional hacia la reconciliacion y la cooperacion.

articles.title: PTC esta unido firmemente con el pueblo, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
PTC esta unido firmemente con el pueblo, destaca Rodong Sinmun
						
Pyongyang, 14 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En su articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que hoy dia, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea muestra su invencible poderio con la alta autoridad directiva porque esta arraigado profundamente en las masas populares y unido monoliticamente con ellas.
					La maxima del PTC consiste en que si confia en el pueblo y se apoya en el, saldra siempre victorioso, pero, cuando sea repudiado, sufre mil derrotas, comienza el articulista y continua:
					
					El PTC es el gran orientador que da la mas valiosa vida politica al pueblo y lo conduce al camino de verdadera vida, el defensor resuelto que defiende la dignidad independiente y el destino de los habitantes y el creador de la felicidad que lucha abnegadamente por ofrecer la vida rica y culta al pueblo.
					
					El amor y la confianza del partido, que aprecia la vida politica de los habitantes con afecto maternal y se responsabiliza totalmente con la vida social y politica de todo el pueblo, se sembraron en el corazon de este como la firme determinacion de compartir para siempre con el partido la vida y la muerte y unieron al partido y las masas populares con vasos sanguineos.
					
					Nuestro partido confia y presenta como eternos acompanantes a todos los que sirven por el partido y la revolucion y se responsabiliza y cuida hasta el final a los que ha confiado.
					
					Hoy dia, en la politica de Songun de nuestro partido palpita la ferrea voluntad de convertir al pueblo coreano en el mas digno y poderoso que nadie puede subestimar.
					
					El PTC, que ha presentado el mejoramiento constante de la vida del pueblo como el maximo principio sus actividades, no escatima nada para el pueblo aunque hay muchas cosas que faltan y orienta lo todo al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo.
					
					La gran unidad de cuerpo y alma, segun la cual el partido trabaja abnegadamente para el pueblo tomandolo como cielo y el segundo confia absolutamente en el primero considerandolo como su madre, es la fuente de invencible poderio y brillante porvenir de nuestra patria.
